package.description:
openni
See https://github.com/OpenNI/OpenNI and https://github.com/PrimeSense/Sensor for install notes if necessary.
You'll need to have at least these packages installed, and possibly more: openjdk-7-jdk libusb-1.0.0-dev
You'll need to make install this package before you can actually run anything that uses a depth sensor. This is because of, among many other things, the USB rules that are required on the system for a sensor to work. make install is not done by default so as to not touch anything on your system unless you explicitly tell it to.
